title: My Patching doesn't move
body:
My patch stops when it scans file named "Fonts_ip.gfx" .

Please help any bit of info might be useful. 
(this is in client)

Thanks, 

######ma friends ;cc

replies.body:
We can't just leave your friends hangin' like that! Let's get you back on the Rift asap!

The client might not be able to get past that particular file if your OS doesn't give it permission to read or write to that file. Hit up our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and follow the steps there to get those settings in place and you should be able to get updated finally!

Thank you but I uninstalled everything then installed and now it worked :P.  
At least someone noticed my post.
